A peasant from Strife who wears a grey-colored tunic. {| border="0" |- !width=7%|Map!!width=14%|Name!!width=76%|Notes |- | MAP04 || {{dw|Ketrick}} || Oversees the core crystal in the power station. |- | MAP05 || {{dw|Warden Montag}} || One of the overseers of the prison. Needs to be killed in order to advance. |- | MAP17 || Assistant / Medic || {{Class|Medic|Quincy}}'s assistant in the Hospital. |} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant7 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 2 }
